title: Trump says the US will send Patriot missiles to Ukraine
shortDescription: The United States, Trump stressed, would not pay for them as he heaped fresh criticism on Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Secret Service did not 'act on direct threats' before Trump shooting: Senate report
shortDescription: Homeland Security Committee Chairman Rand Paul released the Senate report on the anniversary of the shooting in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Trump announces tariffs on Mexico, European Union
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted letters to the leaders of Mexico and the European Union, saying they had not done enough to head off the new tariffs.

title: Trump attends FIFA Club World Cup Final
shortDescription: President Trump attended the FIFA Club World Cup Final at MetLife Stadium. He was met with a mixed reaction.

title: Trump 'border czar' responds to California farmworker's death
shortDescription: According to multiple reports, Jaime Alanis climbed to the roof of a greenhouse in alleged attempt to evade officers.

title: Trump assassination attempt: Remembering reactions
shortDescription: 2024 interviews captured the sentiment of Americans after an assassination attempt on then former President Trump took place in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: 'Going to lose': Trump allies slam administration's handling of Epstein case
shortDescription: Some of the president's most fervent supporters are warning the fallout could have political consequences for Trump and Republicans.

title: Was Trump really shot? Yes, despite conspiracy theories, see evidence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt a year ago. The incident has taken on a life of its own, but now some believe he wasn't shot.

title: Will Trump’s new spending law make college tuition more expensive?
shortDescription: Lending caps and other changes in Trump's 'One Big, Beautiful Bill Act' will likely raise costs for some college students.

title: Trump assassination attempt still reverberates one year later
shortDescription: The tragic shooting in rural Pennsylvania lives on in Donald Trump's rhetoric, his approach to leading the country and how his followers now see him.

title: EU says if no trade deal is struck with Trump, it could retaliate
shortDescription: The EU paused planned countermeasures against the US after Trump delayed a tariff hike. But a new 30% rate has the bloc considering retaliation.

title: Trump backs Bondi, begs 'so-called' MAGA friends to abandon Epstein
shortDescription: MAGA allies have been assailing the attorney general since the DOJ said a review "revealed no incriminating 'client list'" tied to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: President Trump, First Lady Melania visit Texas
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump toured the flood damage in Kerr County, Texas on Friday afternoon.

title: Trump announces new tariffs on Mexico, European Union
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted letters to the leaders of Mexico and the European Union, saying they had not done enough to head off the new tariffs.

title: How the Trump-Putin bromance flowered − then soured
shortDescription: Trump said he would end the war in Ukraine within his first 24 hours in office. His patience with Russia's Putin now appears to be wearing thin.

title: Trump urges immigration agents to arrest 'THUGS' in violent clashes
shortDescription: Trump urged immigration agents to use 'whatever means is necessary' to arrest 'THUGS' who attack them, after violent clash in California.

title: Trump tariffs don't scare the world's first $4 trillion company
shortDescription: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang spoke to USA TODAY about tariffs, trade and his trip to China after a meeting with President Donald Trump at the White House.

title: Trump praises ‘unity’ in Texas flood response
shortDescription: President Donald Trump participated in a roundtable with first responders following devastating Texas floods.

title: Texas man charged with threatening Trump day before flood-damage tour
shortDescription: A Texas man was charged July 10 with threatening Trump the day before the president toured flood-damaged areas of the state.

title: Trump nominates 'alpha male' Nick Adams as U.S. ambassador to Malaysia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump nominated Nick Adams, an Australian-born conservative commentator, to be the next U.S. ambassador to Malaysia.
